Introducing Sun-Washed Citrus by Bath and Body Works, a radiant citrus fragrance designed for women. Launched in 2020, it embodies a vibrant, fruity ray of sunshine. Delight in the harmonious blend of sugared lemons, mandarin, and agave nectar, which gracefully perfume your skin with a delicate, weightless mist. This fragrance is ideal for layering, allowing you to create a personalized scent experience. Immerse yourself in the sheer joy of this invigorating aroma, elevating every moment with a revitalizing touch of vitality.
